##### Booking

×

## MOTORCYCLE TOURS AND ADVENTURES WORLDWIDE

Motorrad Tours are an independent tour operator running a comprehensive
program of tours worldwide. Our full 2024/2025 tour program is online and
available to book with a whole host of stunning new destinations. We offer a
unique style of touring giving you the freedom to ride independently with GPS
routes, maps and route notes or choose to ride with the Tour Leader, it is up
to you. We have four different styles of tour Classic, Explorer, Adventure and
Academy.

Motorrad Tours is the UK’s only Official Travel Partner of BMW Motorrad. We
operate a range of motorcycle tours throughout Europe as well as tours in
Africa, the Americas and Asia. We run these tours for World of BMW, the
activity arm of BMW Motorrad (UK). You are welcome to ride any make of bike on
our tours, but we always ride BMW.

> Travel and adventure have always been a passion of mine and I have been
> fortunate to experience both in many arenas, but the most rewarding has been
> when combined with motorcycles. Being trusted by BMW (UK) as their partner
> in World of BMW is a great honour and I hope you will join me and my highly
> experienced team of Tour Leaders on your next motorcycling adventure. Let us
> help you create memories not dreams.
>
> Chris Hone - Motorrad Tours

## Featured Tours

## ULTIMATE INCAS: CHILE, PERU AND BOLIVIA

Atacama, Incas, Machu Picchu, Lake Titicaca, La Paz, Andes, Nazca.. All
evocative… All must-see-in-your-lifetime destinations… and all on our, new for
2024 , Ultimate Incas Tour!  Every two days in the saddle is almost matched by
a day off. This is essential with so much to see and do, from the UNESCO-
listed Machu Picchu, to boat trips, city tours, and wildlife spotting.

View Tour

Book this Tour

__15-Apr-2024

__Antofagasto, CHI

__20 days tour

__Approx 2803 miles / 4511 km

__ From: 9995£

## HIGHLANDS AND ISLANDS: SCOTLAND

The Scottish Highlands are rightly acclaimed as one of the most beautiful
parts of the world. Featuring vast mountain ranges, timeless lochs and ancient
castles, Scotland is steeped in history, both human and natural.

View Tour

Book this Tour

__05-May-2024

__Edinburgh, SCO

__8 days tour

__Approx 1160 miles / 1867 km

__ From: 1995£

## PORTUGAL AND THE PICOS MOUNTAINS

New tour for 2024. Spend an enchanting time riding twisty, quiet mountain
roads through the rugged landscapes of northern Spain and Portugal. Described
by one of our Tour Leaders as some of the best riding he has ever done; this
tour is a mix of great routes, remarkable scenery and remote mountain
locations in our Portugal motorcycle tour.

View Tour

Book this Tour

__16-Jun-2024

__Plymouth, UK

__13 days tour

__Approx 2230 miles / 3589 km

__ From: 3095£

## ROMANTIC ROAD: GERMANY

Experience the charm of Bavaria on our new 2024 tour; Romantic Road: Germany.
Packed with scenic passes, quaint villages, and beautiful architecture this
low daily mileage tour offers plenty of opportunities to explore on and off
the bike.

View Tour

Book this Tour

__27-Jul-2024

__Folkestone, UK

__14 days tour

__Approx 1640 miles / 2639 km

__ From: 2595£

## RIDE TO THE ROOF OF THE WORLD: HIMALAYAS

If you are seeking a truly unique adventure, where few have ridden before you,
why not join us on our Ride to the Roof of The World: Himalayas tour.  Our
adventure begins on the banks of the Mekong river, northern Thailand.  Our
entry to the Yunnan Province and its incredible mountain ranges will be
through Laos.

View Tour

Book this Tour

__29-Sep-2024

__Chiang Kong, TH

__21 days tour

__Approx 2991 miles / 4814 km

__ From: 9395£

## testimonials

Denise P

You Go Slavia

It was organized, very well thought out and exceeded my expectations. I found
the route and roads to be interesting and picturesque. The accommodations were
all very clean and unique. Our Tour Leader, Steve Freeman, was professional,
thoughtful to everyone’s needs, supportive and considerate. I would absolutely
recommend Motorrad Tours

__

__

__

__

__

__

Richard W

Annecy and the Alps

Couldn’t wish for more. Great Tour Leader, great routes, greet hotels,
Stunning scenery. All the hotels were really nice and some were outstanding.
The routes were well thought out and the coffee breaks/ lunch stops were
generally well spaced and pleasant.

__

__

__

__

__

__

Karl C

Arctic and the Midnight Sun

An absolutely brilliant tour that I would recommend to anyone. The
organisational skills from the initial booking, to saying good bye at the last
dinner was exceptional.

__

__

__

__

__

African Odyssey: South Africa and Namibia

Nothing to fault. Excellent trip. Your in good hands with these guys.

__

This was our fifth tour with Motorrad Tours and we have never been
disappointed. Every tour exceeded our expectations

in a long weekend that we thought could be possible. Looking forward to
planning the next one! Thanks Motorrad team for making this a great experience
for us

## About Us

Motorrad Tours was set up to operate tours for BMW (UK) as part of their World
of BMW activity program.  World of BMW has four main activity arms: Tours,
Road Training, Performance Academy and Off Road Skills. World of BMW has been
operating since 2000 with thousands of happy customers having enjoyed touring,
learning to ride or developing off-road skills with us.

Read More
